name: searchPatient
description: This API call provides ability to search patient records in iDoc database. It will list all the matching records with maximum threshold value passed.

parameters.name: dob
parameters.description: Patient's date of birth. Format YYYY-MM-DD. If value is not as per the desired format, then it will not yield correct result.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Patient's MRN. It can be either Patient's iDoc ID or External MRN ID

parameters.name: maxRecords
parameters.description: Number of maximum records to be pulled in the search result. Maximum records threshold value. If data type is not Integer, then this field will be ignored.
